title: Foundations of Delirium Prediction Modeling in ICU Patients

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Project-based science education program for 30-something professionals conducted in digital device-provided settings

learning_goals: Core algorithms (e.g., RNN/GRU) of the ICU delirium prediction model can be explained
Performance metrics (sensitivity, specificity, etc.) of time-series forecasting models using clinical data can be interpreted
A predictive model based on actual ICU datasets can be designed and presented as a project deliverable
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
